bounce.gui
Class BounceDisplay

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              bounce.gui.BounceDisplay
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
public class BounceDisplay
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

A component in which two-dimensional objects are animated so that they appear to bounce under a typical gravitational force.

See Also:
Serialized Form
